name: Diving Sea Code - LD48 (Deeper and deeper)
name_original: Diving Sea Code - LD48 (Deeper and deeper)
description:
Diving Sea Code is a deep-sea exploration game. You play as an unnamed character diving into their own mind, trying to heal from recent traumas.

No health, no oxygen bar, just explore at your own pace and heal your heart.

Some items might be required to progress and finish the game.

The first screen of the game. The unknown lies beyond these rocks...

These notes might hold the answer to why I’m here…

If you can’t find some of the items, check the collectibles location map here

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys to move

E to interact

I to open the inventory & Mouse to interact within the inventory

ESC to open the menu

Credits

  • bdmaniak : Background Art, Assets
  • kaithor : Engine & Programming
  • MrJotubes : Engine & Programming (https://twitter.com/MrJotubes)
  • LuX34 : Soundtrack (https://www.instagram.com/luxmusicien & https://www.instagram.com/les_shirkers)
